trans-unit.source: Machine Learning example apps in the Azure Marketplace | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning example apps in the Azure Marketplace | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Marketplace App examples show how you can publish your machine learning services to the Azure Marketplace for paying subscribers to use in their apps.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Marketplace App examples show how you can publish your machine learning services to the Azure Marketplace for paying subscribers to use in their apps.

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning Apps in the Azure Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning Apps in the Azure Marketplace

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning provides data scientists with a channel to monetize their know-how and creativity just as smartphone app developers do.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning provides data scientists with a channel to monetize their know-how and creativity just as smartphone app developers do.

trans-unit.source: By publishing your machine learning services in the Azure Marketplace, you enable anyone in the world to pay and subscribe to your published cloud APIs and use them in their apps.
trans-unit.target: By publishing your machine learning services in the Azure Marketplace, you enable anyone in the world to pay and subscribe to your published cloud APIs and use them in their apps.

trans-unit.source: But Azure Marketplace can offer much more than basic analytics APIs.
trans-unit.target: But Azure Marketplace can offer much more than basic analytics APIs.

trans-unit.source: For example, we built a set of finished end-to-end Machine Learning applications to solve specific business needs.
trans-unit.target: For example, we built a set of finished end-to-end Machine Learning applications to solve specific business needs.

trans-unit.source: These Machine Learning apps do not require a data scientist or Machine Learning expertise to use them.
trans-unit.target: These Machine Learning apps do not require a data scientist or Machine Learning expertise to use them.

trans-unit.source: The science is already baked into our solutions.
trans-unit.target: The science is already baked into our solutions.

trans-unit.source: Users can simply supply their own data and start using the apps.
trans-unit.target: Users can simply supply their own data and start using the apps.

trans-unit.source: For example, these apps include :
trans-unit.target: For example, these apps include :

trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: A self-service, but super powerful, recommendation engine that enables you to easily add personalized product recommendations to your website or email campaigns.
trans-unit.target: A self-service, but super powerful, recommendation engine that enables you to easily add personalized product recommendations to your website or email campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Data Market Link
trans-unit.target: Data Market Link

trans-unit.source: Quick Start Guide
trans-unit.target: Quick Start Guide

trans-unit.source: Frequently Bought Together
trans-unit.target: Frequently Bought Together

trans-unit.source: An API that helps your customers discover items in your catalog that are frequently purchased together.
trans-unit.target: An API that helps your customers discover items in your catalog that are frequently purchased together.

trans-unit.source: Use your customer purchase history to add Frequently Bought Together recommendations to your website and to improve conversion in your digital store.
trans-unit.target: Use your customer purchase history to add Frequently Bought Together recommendations to your website and to improve conversion in your digital store.

trans-unit.target: Data Market Link

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: Documentation

trans-unit.source: Anomaly Detection
trans-unit.target: Anomaly Detection

trans-unit.source: An API that can spot anomalous events in time series data (for example, server telemetry or sensor-based data).
trans-unit.target: An API that can spot anomalous events in time series data (for example, server telemetry or sensor-based data).

trans-unit.source: Data Market Link
trans-unit.target: Data Market Link

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: Documentation

trans-unit.source: These APIs allow you to consume powerful machine learning-based services built on Azure Machine Learning, without needing to be a data scientist or spend a lot of time developing apps yourself.
trans-unit.target: These APIs allow you to consume powerful machine learning-based services built on Azure Machine Learning, without needing to be a data scientist or spend a lot of time developing apps yourself.

trans-unit.source: Simply bring your own data and start using them.
trans-unit.target: Simply bring your own data and start using them.

trans-unit.source: Text Analytics
trans-unit.target: Text Analytics

trans-unit.source: This API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis and key phrase extraction.
trans-unit.target: This API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis and key phrase extraction.

trans-unit.source: No training data is needed to use this API, just bring your text data.
trans-unit.target: No training data is needed to use this API, just bring your text data.

trans-unit.source: It uses advanced natural language processing techniques under the hood.
trans-unit.target: It uses advanced natural language processing techniques under the hood.

trans-unit.source: Data Market Link
trans-unit.target: Data Market Link

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: Documentation

trans-unit.source: Customer Churn Prediction
trans-unit.target: Customer Churn Prediction

trans-unit.source: Customer Churn Prediction is a churn analytics service built with Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: Customer Churn Prediction is a churn analytics service built with Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: It's designed to predict when a customer (player, subscriber, user, etc.) is likely to end his or her relationship with a company or service.
trans-unit.target: It's designed to predict when a customer (player, subscriber, user, etc.) is likely to end his or her relationship with a company or service.

trans-unit.source: Being able to predict which customers have a high risk of leaving the relationship with a company provides the company with a window of opportunity to approach them and reduce the likelihood of their leaving.
trans-unit.target: Being able to predict which customers have a high risk of leaving the relationship with a company provides the company with a window of opportunity to approach them and reduce the likelihood of their leaving.
